definition: personal/oneself
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Kenai residents know firsthand the challenges that follow a natural disaster.
sentences.chinese: 肯奈居民从亲身经验知道天灾之后出现的困难。

sentences.english: A small illustration of this is the experience of Richard Garriott.
sentences.chinese: 这副小小的插图描绘的正是理查德加雷特的亲身经历。

sentences.english: I’d like to cite my own experience as an example.
sentences.chinese: 这里我想拿自己的亲身经历作为例证。

sentences.english: Every citizen has a right to participate personally, or through his representative, in its foundation.
sentences.chinese: 全国公民都有权亲身或经由其代表去参与法律的制定。

sentences.english: None but those who have experienced them can conceive of the enticements of science.
sentences.chinese: 只有亲身经历的人才能感受到科学的魅力。

sentences.english: If you didn't experience what they report personally, you don't know if it is true or not.
sentences.chinese: 只要没有亲身经历，你便不能分辨这些话的真假。

sentences.english: International students studying in Canada can get valuable work experInternet Explorernce while they are studying.
sentences.chinese: 在加的出国生在研究期间能得到宝贵的打工亲身经历。

sentences.english: All application should be made in person or by post, first-come-first-serve.
sentences.chinese: 申请人可邮寄或亲身报名，先到先得。

sentences.english: Aunt Sally was to find a cook, a lot, she signed up to personal interview.
sentences.chinese: 莱莉姑姑要找个厨师，良多人应征，她要亲身面试。

sentences.english: According to my manal experience, smile get finiherd me a lot of bad.
sentences.chinese: 根据我一自己亲身历程，微笑已带给我许多好处。

sentences.english: You should not know the joys and sorrows without experienced yourself.
sentences.chinese: 若非亲身经历，岂知其中甘苦。

sentences.english: Be sure to tell us whether you think it is accurate from your own experiences.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了以你的亲身经验告诉我们它是否准确。

sentences.english: Please return this form to any Fubon branch in person if Primary Account is a Credit Card account.
sentences.chinese: 若基本户口是信用卡，请把表格亲身交回本行。

sentences.english: I have experienced this transformation of your country in a highly personal way.
sentences.chinese: 我个人亲身体验了贵国的这一巨变。

sentences.english: A witness appearing in court to give evidence shall impersonally state the facts apperceived by himself.
sentences.chinese: 出庭作证的证人应当客观陈述其亲身感知的事实。

sentences.english: Residents of participating estates can enjoy a first-time trial service to get personal experience of the benefits of massage.
sentences.chinese: 屋苑住客特享初次试做服务，亲身体验服务个中好处。
